summary: This bill, the Protecting Our Supreme Court Justices Act of 2025, amends section 1507 of title 18 of the United States Code. It increases the penalties for obstructing justice by picketing or parading near court buildings or the residences of judges, jurors, witnesses, or other court officers. The bill was introduced in the Senate by Mrs. Blackburn and co-sponsors and was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
